topic.title: It's so sad
topic.body:
**Very regrettable.**

**ZeroNet's constant blockade by the Chinese government.**

**All the ZeroNet's trackers can't be connected in china now.**

**Although Chinese users can use the “Use Tor meek bridges for tracker connections” button to connect to the trackers, the efficiency is very low. **

**This has made it very difficult for Chinese users to use ZeroNet.**

**I really like ZeroNet.**

**So sad.**

1547014808_1JGp4gaBwTZ6rjuLytHJ1o9C93kfk.body: > [nofish](#comment_1234_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Thanks for reporting, how many trackers do you see on ZeroHello and how many of these have low (<20%) success rate? Is this the same if you disable the meek proxies on /Config page? This is the tracker information I copied on now： > TRACKERS: 5/16 >zero://45.77.23.92Error (0% success) >zero://112.102.72.27Error (0% success) >zero://185.142.236.207Announced in 0.00秒 (48% success) >zero://104.156.231.236Announced in 0.00秒 (42% success) >zero://139.180.218.128Error (39% success) >zero://66.42.49.228Error (31% success) >zero://zero.booth.moeAnnounced in 0.00秒 (47% success) >zero://boot3rdez4rzn36x.onionAnnounced in 0.00秒 (55% success) >zero://172.93.52.144Announced in 0.00秒 (40% success) >zero://190.97.167.217Error (48% success) >http://tracker2.itzmx.comAnnouncing (57% success) >http://retracker.mgts.byError (37% success) >zero://83.162.192.96Error (35% success) >zero://173.255.223.86Error (36% success) >http://open.acgnxtracker.comError (70% success) >zero://107.172.237.134Error (17% success) I opened “Use Tor bridges” button ande "Proxy for tracker connections-Tor" in Config, otherwise, there's no Trackers can be connected.
